noise.offersSubtitle: Enable noise monitoring to track noise levels in your properties in real-time.

minut.detailDescription: Minut offers certified noise sensors with native Airbnb integration. The monthly subscription includes access to the dedicated mobile app, automatic guest alerts and 24/7 support.

clenzy.detailDescription: Our Tuya OEM-based solution provides noise monitoring with no monthly subscription. The CLENZY-TUYA-NM-01 sensor integrates natively into the Clenzy platform with real-time data.

config.title: Sensor configuration
config.selectPropertyDesc: Choose the property where the sensor will be installed.
config.roomDesc: If you want to monitor a specific room, enter its name. Leave empty to monitor the entire property.
config.nameDesc: Give your sensor a name to easily identify it in the dashboard.

planning.noPropertiesHint: Properties will appear here once they are created and assigned.
planning.lockedTitle: Planning not available with the Essential plan
planning.lockedDescription: Your current plan does not allow access to the interactive planning or automatic import from Airbnb, Booking, and other platforms. Upgrade to Comfort or Premium to unlock this feature.
